body:
Hey, next saturday (19/09/15) me and tazz are organising an unofficial tournament for Avicus teams to compete in.

The map will be voted before each game,
i will randomise all the teams to find who they are playing.
If you lose a game you are eliminated. if you win you advance to the next bracket.
Minimum players needed 8, maximum 10.

The first game will start at 5pm BST and no games can start after 9:15 BST. Any games that still need to be played can be reschedualed.
Any team who no shows a game will be instantly dq'ed.
Any salt or abuse from any team member leads to that team member being banned from playing. If the team leader can not remove this player the team will be dq'ed.
Don't hack. If a player is caught hacking their team will be DQ'ed.
Subs are not allowed, only players in your forums roster will be permitted to play.

If you would like to referee the matches also add me on skype, please come with previous referee experience and staff is prefered so you can remove any cheaters or salties from the game.

If you are a moderator playing for a team and you believe someone on the opposite team is hacking then you can not make the decision, no matter what and how hard you try you will be bias. 


If you are the leader of a team post here and add me on skype: b.banno321 to confirm and so that you can be added to the tourney leaders chat for further organisation. 

Have fun.

Teams currently entered: 
Bad Company
Apollo
Fortissimus
Patchi
Ethernal Cross
Vincible
BerzerkV2
PowerPuff


Bracket: http://challonge.com/BarneyTazz

replies.body:
Update: We have decided to do a loser bracket so everyone will play at LEAST 2 matches. The losers of the First round (being ro8) will play another loser and then the final will be after that. However, this may happen on a different day due to lack of servers.

Moreover, we might test the two new maps in the losers bracket. This will be confirmed tomorrow (Friday) at about 3:30PM BST

replies.body: Ok. I want every team leader to add me on Skype so you can get more information about the tournament and that. My Skype: MrTazz4077
replies.body_tagged: Ok. I want every team leader to add me on Skype so you can get more information about the tournament and that. My Skype: MrTazz4077

replies.body:
FINAL INFORMATION:

Maps will be decided by a veto process. Each team will veto one of the three maps and the one that is not vetoed will be played. The maps are:
  • Rendezvous 3 CTW
  • Boundaries
  • Senex Scrim
Rules for Rendezvous 3 CTW:

  • No using minecarts to get around bedrock walls.
  • Do not enter your own wool room.
  • Do not build inside the redstone lines when defending so the opposing team can not break blocks and enter the wool room. 
If any of these are broken, they will result in a disqualification for your team. Proof is needed however. Hopefully we will have Referees for the games, especially in the latter part of the tournament. 

We will not be having a losers bracket. We decided this because it is quite useless. Furthermore, we would like players from the losing teams in the first round to volunteer to referee the remaining games. 

All players on the field will be required to be in the Teamspeak3 server that your team leader has or is being given. If your team leader has not (Ethernal Cross), please get Max or Nova to add me on Skype. In this teamspeak, are rooms for each team and each team has a password that again, your team leader has.

Only players in your roster will be able to play.  No exceptions will be made at any point, don't even bother trying. If you can not field 8 players, you will be DQed. The first game will start at 5:00 PM BST, which requires every team to be in Teamspeak at least 15 MINUTES BEFORE 5:00 PM. The latest we will start is at 5:15 PM,  and the team holding us back after that will be disqualified. 

If you are a moderator playing for a team and you believe someone on the opposite team is hacking then you can not make the decision, you can only tell the officials (being Barney or Tazz) on Skype or Teamspeak. No matter what and how hard you try you will be bias.

replies.body:
You may use Skype as long as you have leaders in ts. But make sure you respond to pokes in teamspeak because otherwise it becomes a problem. 

Regarding the losers bracket if any losing teams want to try friendly scrims against each other we have servers booked out so just ask :)

If two teams veto the same map then they just play a map they both agree on.

some questions:
1. which ts we need to be on 15 minutes ago

sorry but that makes no sense even if there are refs there are mods because they are mods and they have perms to ban hackers, i think if a mod will see someone hacking he will leave and spectate a player even its "a tourney", because thats the first priority. however if we will have referees that are also staff that could solve the problem
